name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 18, Taiwanese people launched a protest against the Kuomintang legislators' proposal to cut the national defense budget.
KMT legislators Ma Wenjun and Huang Ren proposed to completely delete the annual follow-up budget for the Haikun-class submarine next year.
Defense Minister Gu Lixiong said today: If the budget is deleted next year, it will not be included until 2017, and the process will be delayed by 2 years. In the future, we will continue to communicate with the legislators.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Regarding everyone's concerns, I will further explain here.
In terms of the distribution structure, the project party holds a total of 25.8%, of which the Snowflake Foundation holds 19.5% for team operations and support for other teams.
Team members get a total of 4%, and I personally hold 2%.
I promise that the foundation will only sell tokens based on the team's operating costs and will not sell them at will. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Chinese companies were exposed to layoffs:
Jiyue Automobile was exposed to layoffs and disbanding, and employees surrounded CEO Xia Yiping and demanded that he pay social security for employees.
FAW Jilin stopped production for several months and owed employees several months of wages. The company owed 3.358 billion yuan and was insolvent.
Porsche China was exposed to layoffs: compensation N+6.
Internet rumor "Mengniu Dairy will lay off 6,000 people to save costs"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Food safety incidents exposed in China in 2024: (incomplete statistics)
In early July, the Beijing News exposed a food safety scandal involving oil tankers transporting cooking oil, which was also the most serious food safety crisis in mainland China since the melamine-tainted milk powder incident in 2008.
----------------------------------------------------------
December:
On December 1, it was reported that the hairy crabs exported from China to Taiwan were found to contain excessive dioxin.
On December 9, it was reported that the ice cream of the mainland restaurant "Fufuland" in Hong Kong Jiulongpo branch was found to contain 689 times more E. coli per gram
On December 11, it was reported that an employee of a food company in Hangzhou reported that the company used moldy prunes to process candied fruit.
On December 16 (report), Zigong, Sichuan. The suspect Huang and three others...
fullContent:
2024年中国被曝出的食品安全事件合订本：(不完全统计)
 7月初，新京报曝光一起油罐车运送食用油的食品安全丑闻，也是2008年三聚氰胺毒奶粉事件后中国大陆最严重的一起食品安全危机。
----------------------------------------------------------
 12月： 
 12月1日报道，中国出口台湾的大闸蟹被验出戴奥辛超标。 
 12月9日报道，内地餐厅「Fufuland」香港九龙坡分店的雪糕被验出大肠杆菌每克超标689倍
 12月11日报道，杭州一食品公司员工举报，公司使用发霉西梅加工蜜饯。
 12月16日(报道)，四川自贡。犯罪嫌疑人黄某等三人在出租屋用甲醛泡毛肚被抓。
----------------------------------------------------------
 11月：
 11月初，打假博主“松哥”举报良品铺子旗下的藕粉、酸辣粉配料表造假。
 11月23日报道，网友称在小孩喝的旺仔牛奶中，发现有疑似死老鼠的异物。
 11月29日，博主“老爸评测”发布报告，指出紫燕百味鸡大肠杆菌超标290倍。
----------------------------------------------------------
 10月：
 10月23日，中国出口欧盟的鸡蛋被检测出恩诺沙星含量超标。
 ---------------------------------------------------------
  9月：
  9月2日报道，央视曝光黑心商家用工业硫磺熏制枸杞。
  9月初，不少网友发现家里的月饼含有脱氢乙酸钠，该防腐添加剂长期食用会造成肝脏损伤。
----------------------------------------------------------
 7月：
 7月16报道，香港消委会测出内地售卖的农夫山泉和百岁山矿泉水溴酸盐超标。
----------------------------------------------------------
 6月：
 6月17日，山东滨州雅士亨鸭肠车间环境脏乱差，现场令人作呕。
----------------------------------------------------------
 3月：
 3月15日，央视315晚会曝光：安徽阜阳黑心厂家用劣质槽头肉制作梅菜扣肉。
----------------------------------------------------------

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 18, a netizen posted a post to commemorate a medical worker who died on the front line due to overwork during the epidemic.
She was not only a medical worker, but also a great mother. At present, her child has become a family member of a martyr and enjoys a monthly state allowance of 2,800 yuan until graduation from university.
The netizen replied, "So it was not the virus that killed the mother, but she died of exhaustion from not resting for 70 days, right?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A collection of food safety incidents in China in 2024: (incomplete statistics)
In early July, the Beijing News exposed a food safety scandal involving oil tankers transporting cooking oil, which was also the most serious food safety crisis in mainland China since the melamine-tainted milk powder incident in 2008.
----------------------------------------------------------
December:
On December 1, it was reported that Chinese hairy crabs exported to Taiwan were found to contain excessive levels of dioxin.
On December 9, it was reported that ice cream from the Hong Kong Kowloonpo branch of the mainland restaurant "Fufuland" was found to contain 689 times more E. coli per gram
On December 11, it was reported that an employee of a food company in Hangzhou reported that the company used moldy prunes to process candied fruit.
On December 16 (report), Zigong, Sichuan. The suspect Huang and three others...

----------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------

10月16日，家长发现昆明云子中学食堂提供变质发臭的肉给学生食用。 
10月23日，中国出口欧盟的鸡蛋被检测出恩诺沙星含量超标。
 
 ---------------------------------------------------------
  9月：
  9月2日报道，央视曝光黑心商家用工业硫磺熏制枸杞。
  9月初，不少网友发现家里的月饼含有脱氢乙酸钠，该防腐添加剂长期食用会造成肝脏损伤。

----------------------------------------------------------

 6月17日，山东滨州雅士亨鸭肠车间环境脏乱差，现场令人作呕。
----------------------------------------------------------
 3月：
 3月15日，央视315晚会曝光：安徽阜阳黑心厂家用劣质槽头肉制作梅菜扣肉。
 3月17日报道，有商家用鸡骨泥代替鸡肉，制作淀粉肠。
----------------------------------------------------------

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 16th Beijing A parent posted a video saying that his son bought a "hot book" called "Wild History". It was packaged as a textbook, and the content was full of vulgarity. It was suspected to be an illegal book and has been reported. In addition, this series of books also includes spoof textbooks such as "King of Glory" and "Chicken Studies". Some netizens commented: "Great, the country has finally started to pay attention. As long as this problem is solved, I think school bullying will disappear." The book has been removed from Taobao

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A New York man has pleaded guilty to charges that he helped run a "Chinese secret police station." According to U.S. prosecutors: The New York-based Chinese overseas secret police station was set up by the Fuzhou Public Security Bureau in China to intimidate and silence Chinese government critics in New York.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 18, blogger "啄MU鸟佑中华" posted a "lawful complaint" on Weibo: 11 restaurants in Qingpu District, Shanghai, have Islamic or ethnic characters and elements. It is believed that the appearance of these religious or ethnic symbols is suspected of ethnic/religious discrimination. The District Market Supervision Bureau is requested to verify and punish them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In December, the blogger also reported the Shanghai Hui Kindergarten, saying that there was Arabic written below the kindergarten's sign and a mosque design on the window frame.
On December 16, the police went to the scene to remove the palindrome translation and repainted it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 19, it was reported that Mengniu laid off 6,000 employees. In the comment section, some netizens said that they did not receive the statutory N+1 compensation, and it took a long time to get the severance pay of two months' salary.
Currently, the WeChat version of this article cannot be viewed due to a complaint of suspected infringement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 28, a customer was test-driving the Wenjie M5 as a passenger. When the salesperson was demonstrating the intelligent driving function, the intelligent driving failed to identify the bus, causing the customer to crash into the bus at full speed, causing a spinal fracture and irreversible neurological tinnitus. Because unilateral irreversible neurological tinnitus does not meet the disability assessment conditions, Wenjie refused to compensate for lifelong tinnitus disability

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the wife of the truck driver who jumped off the bridge in Zhengzhou complained that the law enforcement staff refused to provide the law enforcement recorder video, and the family still does not know what happened before the truck driver jumped off the bridge. The driver's wife said: The truck belongs to the company. Her husband had only worked for the company for four days on the day of the incident, and the freight route was also designated by the company. Overloading the truck and driving on the elevated road are violations, but the crime is not punishable by death. The law enforcement officer said: The driver's illegal behavior was only fined 100 and deducted one point. The family believes that if the fine is really that much, no one will be so excited. The family does not want this tragedy to happen again, and hopes that the relevant departments can give them justice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution December 16 South China Agricultural University's student dormitories are being managed in a military style, requiring students to turn off lights at a fixed time at night and to turn off lights immediately after the lights-out whistle is blown, otherwise they may be criticized.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 18 Macau The U.S. Consulate General in Hong Kong and Macau issued a statement saying: Because the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs refused to issue the required visa to the U.S. consul in a timely manner, the U.S. consular services in Macau today were forced to be postponed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen submission On December 18, a student from Pingxiang Xiangdong Middle School submitted a submission saying that his school violated the regulations of the Education Bureau by offering Saturday make-up classes and evening self-study classes from Monday to Friday and Sunday. However, in order to prevent exposure, they actually asked a parent to collect the make-up class fees in each class group. I cannot tolerate the school treating us like leeks. Xiangdong Middle School is a key public high school in the district. It is obviously illegal to charge for make-up classes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 20 Weibo hot search: Many places officially announced the cancellation of public areas
On December 17, Zhangjiakou City, Hebei Province issued a policy to encourage the sale of existing houses and gradually cancel public areas. Previously, Hengyang City, Hunan Province, made it clear that the sale of commercial housing should be priced according to the floor area of the unit. At present, the "cancellation of public areas" has begun to take effect in many places.
Yan Yuejin, deputy director of Shanghai E-House Real Estate Research Institute, said: "The criticism of public areas in recent years is that the housing rate is too low, which affects the rights and interests of home buyers."
"The successive introduction of policies shows that the cancellation of public areas is an important task in 2025. The housing rate of a 100-square-meter house may reach 100%, which will help improve the quality of home purchases, confidence in home purchases, and enhance the enthusiasm for home purchases."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the legal person of Shandong Datang Energy Saving Materials Co., Ltd. reported in real name that many leaders in Qujing used criminal penalties to pay off debts and appropriated the tens of millions of yuan in payment for the polysilicon construction project of Xinyi Silicon Industry. The legal person said: Yu, director of the Qujing Municipal Market Supervision Bureau, and the corresponding district and town market supervision bureau directors, under the instruction of two city leaders in Qujing, cooperated with Yunnan Xinyi Company to suppress and harm foreign companies. Liu, a senior executive of the polysilicon project of Xinyi Company, colluded with the three-level market supervision bureaus of the city, district and town to fabricate facts, and used illegal sampling, interference in the judiciary and other means to achieve criminal penalties to pay off debts and appropriate the tens of millions of yuan in payment for the company.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The company also hung a red banner at the entrance of the Yunnan Provincial Market Supervision Bureau to collect debts.
The whistleblower also provided a statement from Xinyi Silicon Industry, which showed that the quality of each incoming shipment was checked and a statement was signed stating that there was no objection to the quality. The reason why the batch of thermal insulation materials was scrapped due to unqualified quality may be that the material storage at the construction site of Xinyi Silicon Industry was unqualified, resulting in the materials being soaked in water.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 19, the Yueqing City Legal System and Business Service Center sent a letter to all enterprises in the city to warn them of distant-water fishing: they found that some out-of-town law enforcement departments illegally sealed, froze, or even transferred corporate or personal property during law enforcement in Yueqing, which had a huge impact on related production and operations. 
The company was informed that if it was found that out-of-town public security organs were enforcing the law without the accompaniment of local police, they should immediately contact the local police to come to the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 18, Lou Hai, secretary of the Fengxian County Party Committee, who was dismissed in 2022 for the "Iron Chain Girl" incident, was sentenced to 10 years and 6 months in prison and fined 1 million yuan for taking bribes and abusing his power.
The verdict showed that he was still amassing wealth in the month he was dismissed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution Recently, Beijing Metro requires employees to sign a letter of commitment
Requires employees to promise:
1. No investment failure, life frustration, psychological imbalance
2. No family discord, loans, or credit card arrears
3. No extreme thoughts caused by beliefs, dissatisfaction with national policies
4. No lawsuits or disputes with the company
5. No application for labor arbitration
6. No petitions
It also requires employees to have no work-related injuries, no bad remarks, and requires employees to guarantee that they will not engage in personal extreme behavior

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 18, Yangzhou City, Jiangsu Province, the Yangzhou Municipal Bureau of Commerce punished Huawei dealers for bundling sales when selling Mate70Pro+ phones.
The blogger said: Huawei likes to play bundling sales now, and this behavior is normal for Huawei dealers

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen submitted a request for help: On December 15, in the Mingfa International City community on Yueliang Island in Changsha, the developer of Mingfa hired gangsters to intimidate the owners with machetes, and a mass incident occurred. The ownership of the community’s underground garage has not yet been determined. The developer forcibly charged fees and blocked the owners from entering and leaving their homes. The government police station turned a blind eye and did not deal with the gangsters with machetes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 19, after a professor at Renmin University asked Kazakh officials how to get women to have more children, the Kazakh International News Agency sent 12 microblogs to refute the rumor: emphasizing Kazakhstan's protection of women's rights and providing a safety net for families with many children through a sound social welfare system. It also said that the development of women's rights promotes the prosperity of Kazakhstan, half of the country's self-employed are women, and the "Women in Business" program has been implemented.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some netizens found out that CCTV had broadcast a TV series called "Axia" that was suspected of praising the trafficking of women.
"Axia" is a TV series reflecting rural themes. It tells the story of a Sichuan girl named Axia who was deceived by her cousin to Shanxi Province on the pretext of finding a job, and then sold to a poor and backward mountain village farmer's home as a daughter-in-law for 6,000 yuan. Although she escaped several times, she was caught back every time.
Once, on the way back to her hometown in Sichuan, she accidentally fell off a cliff. The simple and kind villagers sent her to the hospital and took the initiative to donate blood to her. The villagers' sincere enthusiasm moved Axia, and she decided to stay and teach everyone her craft of weaving willow baskets to lead everyone to get rich.
The play premiered on the CCTV TV series channel on June 7, 2006.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, the entire city of Macau has banned screens, and citizens complain: It’s better to impose martial law

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, sanitation workers in Xi'an were owed wages for 5 months, and the sanitation workers blocked the road to demand wages, which attracted attention.
After a man uploaded the incident to the Internet, he was summoned by the local police and asked to delete the video. The police reminded him: What does this have to do with you? In the future, you must comment carefully on everything on the Internet, otherwise you will bear legal consequences.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 18 (Released) Ganzhou, Jiangxi. A mother was walking with her 3-year-old daughter in the park when she was pinned to the ground and bitten by four vicious dogs.
Family members said that the flesh on the adult's legs was torn off and eaten by the dogs, and the exposed wounds were large enough to fit a hand. A hole was also bitten on the child's waist and back, and the dog owner only paid part of the medical expenses of 32,000 yuan. "The dog owner's attitude is arrogant"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This morning, Xi Jinping visited the Hengqin Guangdong-Macao Deep Cooperation Zone. Netizens said that along the roads in Zhuhai across the river from Hengqin, police, armed police, and firefighters can be seen everywhere. "Basically there is a police car every 100 meters, and the electronic advertising screens and parking lot entrance and exit gate display screens are all off or covered with paper."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, traffic control has been implemented at many roundabouts in Macau

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 18, in Mayang County, Hunan Province, a local chili pepper grower named "Lazi Ge" posted a video saying that local officials used their reputation to exaggerate the chili pepper production in propaganda reports.
Lazi Ge said: "The harvest volume mentioned in the report is 20,000 kilograms, and the price per kilogram ranges from 5 to 6 yuan. It is expected that I can earn about 400,000 yuan this year." These are all lies and fabricated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, California man Liu Weiyue was sentenced to 41 months in prison for "operating birth tourism for Chinese women to the United States". According to US law, these children born in the United States will automatically obtain US citizenship.
In September this year, Liu Weiyue was convicted of conspiracy and money laundering for operating the "Phoebe Baby" confinement center. Dong Jing, who was married to him but refused to believe and later separated, was also convicted at the same time. It is expected that her sentencing decision will be made later.
Between 2012 and 2015, the "Phoebe Baby" confinement center helped hundreds of women from China come to the United States to give birth. The couple charged these "tourists" up to $40,000.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 18, Lou Hai, secretary of the Fengxian County Party Committee who was dismissed for the "Iron Chain Girl" incident, was sentenced to 12 years in prison and fined 1 million yuan for taking bribes and abusing his power.
The court verdict showed that he was still amassing wealth in the month he was dismissed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on December 19, people familiar with the matter revealed that the US government is considering imposing a ban on TP-Link, a Chinese wireless network router manufacturer, on the grounds that it poses a national security risk. The Wall Street Journal quoted sources as saying that multiple US departments have launched an investigation into TP-Link, with the goal of banning the sale of TP-Link routers in the United States as early as next year.
If the news is true, this will be the largest withdrawal of Chinese telecommunications equipment from the US market since the Trump administration ordered the removal of Huawei equipment in 2019.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on December 18, a man in Qianshan, Anhui, hunted wild boars and kept two wild boar cubs in captivity. He was prosecuted for suspected illegal hunting, which aroused doubts from netizens.
Netizens replied, "On the one hand, hunting is prohibited, and on the other hand, people are paid to catch pigs. This operation is really far ahead."
At present, the comment area has turned on the "banned comment mode"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 18, a lawyer wrote an article satirizing the current phenomenon of heavy penalties for minor offenses and heavy sentences for minor cases.
The lawyer said that digging a pit or well can be considered illegal mining, taking bird eggs can be sentenced to ten years in prison, and selling parrots can start at three years. It is recommended that the National People's Congress draft the "Air Law of the People's Republic of China" as soon as possible to prevent the flow of air abroad and the loss of state-owned assets.
Netizens also joked that "the right to use sunlight should also be protected by law."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 18 (Release) A bullying incident occurred in Guiyang Experimental Primary School. The video shows that the boy repeatedly pressed a girl on the table and yelled at her. Then the teacher entered the classroom. At this time, the girl began to retch due to discomfort. The students around her were still bullying her, but the teacher turned a blind eye. Afterwards, the girl's family questioned the parents of the bullying student in the WeChat group, but the teacher disbanded the parent group, and the video posted by the family on Douyin was also restricted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shanghai Statistics Bureau: In November, Shanghai achieved social consumer goods retail sales of 144.295 billion yuan, a year-on-year decrease of about 13.5%
Previously, the State Council Information Office stated that the current economic situation: production increased, demand increased, employment was stable, the market was warm, and quality was excellent.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on December 19, the regulatory authorities require the regulation of public statements by chief economists, securities analysts, and fund managers.
Previously, Chinese economists Gao Shanwen and Fu Peng had their short video accounts blocked after they pointed out domestic economic problems in an internal speech.
Netizens said: "Stop talking, this is indeed a good way to solve the problem"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, an employee of Jiyue Automobile wrote a long article to complain that CEO Xia Yiping is "a 200-pound child who never grows up, a diligent tyrant" and bluntly said that Xia Yiping wants to get involved in everything, but he can't do anything well, and he uses almost violent means to manage the internal affairs, which makes everyone hate him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 19, Beijing. A woman posted that her whole family is currently unemployed. She lost her job in January and is now a full-time babysitter at home. Her younger brother and husband, who work in the construction industry, have also lost their jobs recently. Her sister's company went bankrupt. Her brother-in-law, a programmer, lost his job in December.
The only thing she has now is her parents' 100 yuan monthly pension.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens reported on social platforms that after WeChat was banned, they needed to install the "National Network Identity Authentication" application to unblock it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
South Korean intelligence agency: At least 100 North Korean troops aiding Russia were killed.
Lee Seong-gwon, a member of the National Power Party of South Korea, revealed on the 19th that the National Intelligence Service reported at a closed-door symposium hosted by the National Assembly Intelligence Committee that at least 100 North Korean troops aiding Russia were killed. It is reported that the highest-ranking officer killed in the North Korean army is likely to be a general.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 19, Heilongjiang. Traffic police on Yaxue Highway were checking illegal vehicles, and a car drove quickly towards the traffic police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 19, road closures in various parts of Macau:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the "China Human Capital Report 2024" was released, which pointed out that the average age of the national labor force is 39.72 years old, and China's working-age population has decreased by nearly 55 million in 10 years.
Netizens replied, "People over 35 are not needed, there is no one."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 19, a car hit a girl outside the fourth primary school in Baofeng County, Pingdingshan, Henan Province. A girl was hit and fell to the ground covered in blood. The angry parents beat the driver.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, Global Times editorial: "Looking forward to the two-way cooperation between CPTPP and China"
Netizens said, "Does the two-way cooperation mean that others should lower their standards?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 18 (Released) Shandong. A doctor with a master's degree in traditional Chinese medicine posted a video complaining that her monthly salary was only 3,800 yuan, and her salary was in arrears. She said: This amount of money is not enough to pay off Huabei and mortgage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
An insider said: "Several students were injured"
"It was just after school when a car rushed in and hit several people"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"No malicious questions allowed"
On December 19, a Xiaohongshu netizen posted: "Why can't 1.4 billion of us drive consumption? What is the problem?"
After clicking on the post, it shows: The current content cannot be displayed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shanghai Statistics Bureau: In November, Shanghai achieved social consumer goods retail sales of 144.294 billion yuan, a year-on-year decrease of about 13.5%. Previously, the State Council Information Office stated that the current economic situation is: increased production, increased demand, stable employment, warm market and excellent quality.
